evidence_in_dialogue: [[Grissom]] why would a guy shoot a man three times and then strangle him with his own tie ?
[[Catherine]] oh , i hope that 's shelley danvers the woman from the hotel spa
[[Grissom]] see if this laceration on this guy 's forehead is consistent with the kid 's shovel
[[Brass]] well , my guy in the hotel lounge tells me that tina and shelley were having a catfight over some dude named jeremy the day she died
[[Grissom]] did you learn to throw pizzas in prison , roger ?
[[Benjamin_Jennings]] look what i did -- i just lost my head
[[Tina_Kolas]] i did n't mean to kill her
